about_the_game:
You find yourself in a strange new world on an island called Clover Island. Here you meet a small community of Elves, Goblins, Dwarves, and other humans going through everyday life together. In this new world, dungeons are a vital source of income, and Dungeonpreneurs are the daring adventurers who explore the ever-changing dungeons for their vast resources! As a Dungeonpreneur you live your everyday life by exploring dangerous dungeons to gather rare loot and exotic ingredients and use your findings to stock up your item shop and sell delicious meals in your tavern.

Learn why you were brought to this world, fall in love with the kind townsfolk, save them from a terrible danger threatening their way of life, and grow your guild to reach the top of the guild rankings!

Manage Your Guild

  • Run a thriving item shop. Profit from your dungeon expeditions by selling loot items in your very own shop. Use your haggling skills to get the best deals!

  • Cook delicious dishes to sell in your tavern. Serve the hungry patrons of Clover Island. Set the menu for the day by taking into account factors like which patrons will be visiting for the day.

  • Complete dangerous and profitable contracts. Any half decent Dungeonpreneur knows the way to maximising profits: take well paying contracts to ensure your dungeon expeditions do not just rely on what you can loot. Help townsfolk to find rare items, clear out monsters, and anything else they can think of - for a price of course.

  • Convince local townsfolk to join your very own guild. Each character living in Clover Island has their own specialities, and some might be swayed into joining your ambitious new guild. Use their skills to your advantage to grow your guild into a money-making powerhouse!

  • Rise in the Guild Rankings. Each season the Guild Rankings take place. Your guild will be judged on your profit making abilities and achievements, so defeat your rivals and become the greatest guild of all time!

Explore the World

  • Explore this fantastical strange world. Get to know Clover Island, which desperately needs a successful Dungeonpreneur. The magically infused world you find yourself in has strange plants, fantastical beasts, many secrets and even more dangers.

  • Conquer dangerous dungeons. Explore the four dungeons situated around Clover Island, each with its own monsters and loot. Each monster will require its own strategy to beat. Do not underestimate them: monsters are dangerous and have their own tactics to defeat unsuspecting adventurers.

  • Magical shifting dungeons. No dungeon is ever the same! Their layouts constantly shift due to their magical properties. Can you keep your wits about you and get out safely with your loot? Make the tough calls on your expeditions: do you go forward for that one more floor and risk it all. Or do you return to town with what you got so far?

Get to Know the Townsfolk

  • Take a break from your adventures and get to know the Townsfolk. Meet dwarves, elves, goblins, fae, and humans in this strange fantastical world. They all play their own part for the town: running shops and guilds, guarding the island from monsters, fishing, farming, etc.

  • Compete with rivals. Not everyone will embrace you and your guild with open arms. Compete with rival Dungeonpreneurs who will try to make their own profits at your expense. Contracts and dungeons are not a monopoly, so you will have to be quicker and smarter to beat the competition!

  • Make friends and find love. Become friends with the locals, and perhaps even profess your love if you find that special someone.

    Note: This game is currently in early development. Join our Discord community to stay updated on the latest progress and get a sneak peek at what’s coming next!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16+
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Dungeonpreneur

  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Live the life of a daring Dungeonpreneur and build your ultimate guild in this blend of dungeon crawling and business! Explore dungeons for rare loot and ingredients, and profit by running an item shop and tavern. Befriend locals, expand your guild, and uncover the secrets of this new fantasy world!
